# ic-theme



<!-- Auto Generated Below -->


## Properties

| Property     | Attribute     | Description                                                                                                        | Type                                                                             | Default   |
| ------------ | ------------- | ------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------ | -------------------------------------------------------------------------------- | --------- |
| `brandColor` | `brand-color` | The brand colour. Can be a hex value e.g. "#ff0000", RGB e.g. "rgb(255, 0, 0)", or RGBA e.g. "rgba(255, 0, 0, 1)". | `` `#${string}` \| `rgb(${string})` \| `rgba(${string})` \| null \| undefined `` | `null`    |
| `theme`      | `theme`       | The theme mode. Can be "dark", "light", or "system". "system" will use the device or browser settings.             | `"dark" \| "light" \| "system" \| undefined`                                     | `"light"` |
